entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Salluit
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:50 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 40. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 40. Wind chill minus 49 this evening and minus 54 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
